90 QtDcmPreferences * QtDcmPreferencesWidget::getPreferences()
91 {
92  return d->preferences;
93 }
94 
95 void QtDcmPreferencesWidget::setPreferences ( QtDcmPreferences * prefs )
96 {
97  d->preferences = prefs;
98 
99  localDicomSettingsWidget->setPreferences(d->preferences);
100  serversDicomSettingsWidget->setPreferences(d->preferences);
101 }
